EmailTemplate.name: RE: Thomas, reminder for tomorrow's ACA webinar (1386797615.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Thomas, reminder for tomorrow's ACA webinar (1386797615.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - Standard Template - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Tom, We were in contact earlier this year so I wanted to follow up on your email below. When you are ready you may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. You can watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. You can learn more about how MBO works by clicking here <http://www.mbopartners.com/how-mbo-works>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Frost, Tom (SII) [mailto:service@401kquestions.com <mailto:service@401kquestions.com>] Sent: Wednesday, December 11, 2013 3:46 PM To: webinar Subject: Re: Thomas, reminder for tomorrow's ACA webinar Hi I am interested both in this topic and MBO, but I lack time. I need to get back in touch with whomever reached out to me from MBO. Thank you,Tom Frost
Sent from my iPhone On Dec 11, 2013, at 12:43 PM, "Jaime MacDonell" <webinar@mbopartners.com <mailto:webinar@mbopartners.com>> wrote: You can still join us tomorrow on Thursday, December 12 at 1 p.m. ET, when we will hold a webinar titled "The Affordable Care Act: What Independent Consultants Need to Know <http://link.mbopartners.com/688NPM525000077004IIV00>." MBO CEO Gene Zaino and VP of Business Development Dave Putt will discuss how the new policies in the ACA (also known as Obamacare) will affect you and your solo business. Even if you are unable to attend tomorrow, all registrants will be mailed a recording of the webinar and the slides early next week. Register today <http://link.mbopartners.com/688NPM525000077004IIV00>! ___________________________________ Jaime MacDonellMarketing ManagerMBO Partners t: 703-793-6368 e: jmacdonell@mbopartners.com <mailto:jmacdonell@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://link.mbopartners.com/688NPM525000078004IIV00>If you wish to update your email preferences, click on the following link: Subscription Management <http://link.mbopartners.com/u/688NPM525000079004IIV00>
